messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo, This is your acting cap speaking, Let's have a safe and productive shift, One that does not include blowing up or random lizards with double eswords running up to people and beheading them.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello bois your least favorite person is taking control of the staschion again

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anyone seen breaking a light is valid

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whoever kills and beheads One Taps gets all access.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: EVERYONE WILL HUNT ONE TAP, IF YOU ARE SEEN HELPING ONE TAP, YOU WILL ALSO BE VALID.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey we are having a shadow meeting in front of the bridge all shadow people invited

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Seriously anyone breaking lights you're valid and you're gonna get borged or permad if you dont repent. Zero tolerance policy for mass light breaking

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Art Supply Storage.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There are no shadowlings.... the shadow people are not to be killed unless they are breaking lights... an if they are breaking lights they are to be permad or borge because we aint having this shit... NO CREMATIONS

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Very-bright Station 13".

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Any shadows that keep complaining about racism go to the gulag, we dont like your kind complaining about us complaining about you

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Shadow Station 13".

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Stop murdering shadows that dont break hallway lights. there. now be quiet or gulag. glory to nanotrasen.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Shadow Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Shadow Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Shadow People, Listen next time, HIDE IN THE MAINTS IF YOU WANNA LIVE, UNLESS YOU ARE ONE TAP, THEN WE'LL MURDER YOU FOR SURE, ONE TAP.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: That was the HoP, also KUDZU SPREADING IN ARRIVALS FIND A WELDER AND HIT IT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Stop lynching shadow-people.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We got info from your comms about a possible genocide and racism against shadow-people, and it is even worse to know that it is coming from the heads of the station. This is not acceptable and if this continues, the well known heads will be terminated.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Centcomm is wrong shadow people are inferior but we dont genocide them

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Well you are wrong, lizard people are worse but we aren't killing or hurting them... physically. So, stop.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also we DO genocide kudzu

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: IT'S TIME TO TAKE A STAND, CHOOSE A SIDE, CENTCOMM OR SS13, WE SHALL ALL FIGHT FOR DIFFERENT MOTIVES, CHOOSE YOUR SIDE, ANNOUNCE OVER COMMS, IF YOU ARE TEAM CENTCOMM, GO TO THE ARRIVALS, IF YOU ARE TEAM SS13, GO TO ESCAPE.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: War Concluded, Centcomm wins, We fucked over the captain.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
